required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Hepatic Enzymes, Psychological Measures, and Sexual Dysfunction Responses to Aerobic Exercise in Hepatitis-C Men
clinical_study.official_title: Is There a Response of Hepatic Enzymes, Psychological Measures, and Sexual Dysfunction to Aerobic Exercise in Men With Sexual Dysfunction Complaint and Hepatitis C

brief_summary.textblock: Chronic hepatitis C virus (HCV) infection is a systematic disease that affects several aspects of patients' well-being, including physical, mental, social, and sexual quality of life. In recent years, this clinical trial aims to search the Response of Hepatic Enzymes, Psychological Measures, and Sexual Dysfunction to Aerobic Exercise in Hepatitis Men With Sexual Dysfunction Complaint

detailed_description.textblock: Hepatitis Men With Sexual Dysfunction (erectile dysfunction) Complaint (n=46) will be randomized randomly to 23-men exercise-training (one hour walking on treadmill, for 3 months, three walking sessions per the week) hepatitis-C group or 23-men waiting-hepatitis-C group.

primary_outcome.time_frame: It will be measured after 12 weeks of training
primary_outcome.description: it will assess the sexual dysfunction in men

secondary_outcome.time_frame: It will be measured after 12 weeks of training
secondary_outcome.description: it is an enzyme of liver will assess the liver funtions

secondary_outcome.time_frame: It will be measured after 12 weeks of training
secondary_outcome.description: it is an enzyme of liver will assess the liver funtions

secondary_outcome.time_frame: It will be measured after 12 weeks of training
secondary_outcome.description: it is a questionnaire that will assess Self-Esteem

secondary_outcome.time_frame: It will be measured after 12 weeks of training
secondary_outcome.description: it is a questionnaire that will assess mood of men

secondary_outcome.time_frame: It will be measured after 12 weeks of training
secondary_outcome.description: it is a questionnaire that will assess depression of men

arm_group.description: In this group, Hepatitis-C Men With Sexual Dysfunction (erectile dysfunction) Complaint (n=23) will receive exercise-training sessions (one hour walking on treadmill, for 3 months, three walking sessions per the week)
in this group, Hepatitis-C Men With Sexual Dysfunction (erectile dysfunction) Complaint (n=23) will act as a control (waitlist) group that will receive no trainning

intervention.description: Hepatitis-C Men With Sexual Dysfunction (erectile dysfunction) Complaint will receive exercise-training sessions (one hour walking on treadmill, for 3 months, three walking sessions per the week)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- men with hepatitis C men diagnosis
- men with sexual dysfunction (erectile dysfunction)
Exclusion Criteria:
- obesity , men with cardiac/thoracic/systemic diseases, drugs for sexual dysfunction (erectile dysfunction)

eligibility.gender_description: based on self-representation of gender identity.

responsible_party.investigator_title: lecturer of Physical Therapy for Cardiovascular / Respiratory Disorder and Geriatrics, Faculty of Physical Therapy, Cairo University
